content.p:
ยง 6216. State aid. The board of trustees shall continue to pay
salaries to the supervisors, teachers and all other employees of any
preparatory high school or model school under its jurisdiction which
shall be the same as those paid by the board of education of the same
city to persons discharging like functions in similar schools under the
jurisdiction of the said board of education. The city school district
of such city shall be entitled to receive apportionments of public
school moneys for the elementary and secondary schools maintained in and
by such city and under the control of the board of trustees on the same
basis as such city school district receives apportionments of public
school moneys for the elementary and high school conducted by the board
of education of such city. The board of trustees shall make all reports
required by the commissioner of education as the basis for calculating
such apportionment.
